utilities

Class DollarP

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.DollarP

  • public class DollarP
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Vigneet Sompura Contains utilities and static methods for recognizing gestures using $P recognizer.

      • cloudDistance

        public static double cloudDistance(Template candidate,
                                   Template temp,
                                   int N,
                                   int start)
        Calculates the min diatance between candidate and template with sampling rate N considering start as starting index.
        Parameters:
        candidate - gesture
        temp - Template gesture
        N: - sampling rate
        start - starting point
        Returns:
        sum of min distance over all points
